title: Acadia National Park: Eating
body: Where to Eat        The Jordan Pond House offers scenic outdoor dining as well as indoor facilities. NPS          Jordan Pond House       The only dining facility in the park, the Jordan Pond House Restaurant serves lunch, tea, and dinner (mid-May through late October). For information, visit their website at http://acadiajordanpondhouse.com.       Many dining options are available in nearby communities. Local chambers of commerce can provide you with more information.      Area Restaurants
